00396    // add and read method templates for scalar parameters
00397  
00398    /* 
00399    * Add a ScalarParam to the list.
00400    */ 
00401    template <typename Type>
00402    ScalarParam<Type>& ParamComposite::add(const char *label, Type &value) 
00403    {
00404       ScalarParam<Type>* ptr = new ScalarParam<Type>(label, value);
00405       list_.push_back(ptr);
00406       isLeaf_.push_back(true);
00407       ++size_;
00408       ptr->setIndent(*this);
00409       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00410       if (hasParamCommunicator()) 
00411          ptr->setParamCommunicator(paramCommunicator());
00412       #endif
00413       return *ptr;
00414    }
00415    
00416    /* 
00417    * Add a Param to the list, and read its contents from file. 
00418    */ 
00419    template <typename Type>
00420    ScalarParam<Type>& 
00421    ParamComposite::read(std::istream &in, const char *label, Type &value) 
00422    {
00423       ScalarParam<Type>* ptr = &add<Type>(label, value);
00424       ptr->readParam(in);
00425       return *ptr;
00426    }
00427

00430    /* 
00431    * Add a CArrayParam object associated with a built-in array.
00432    */
00433    template <typename Type>   
00434    CArrayParam<Type>& 
00435    ParamComposite::addCArray(const char *label, Type *value, int n) 
00436    {
00437       CArrayParam<Type>* ptr = new CArrayParam<Type>(label, value, n);
00438       list_.push_back(ptr);
00439       isLeaf_.push_back(true);
00440       ++size_;
00441       ptr->setIndent(*this);
00442       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00443          if (hasParamCommunicator()) 
00444             ptr->setParamCommunicator(paramCommunicator());
00445       #endif
00446       return *ptr;
00447    }
00448    
00449    /* 
00450    * Add a a CArrayParam associated with a built-in array, and read it.
00451    */
00452    template <typename Type>   
00453    CArrayParam<Type>& 
00454    ParamComposite::readCArray(std::istream &in, 
00455                    const char *label, Type *value, int n) 
00456    {
00457       CArrayParam<Type>* ptr = &addCArray<Type>(label, value, n);
00458       ptr->readParam(in);
00459       return *ptr;
00460    }
